message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. This is a one-time offer, so I'd love to hear your thoughts!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer! I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to consider a price closer to that range?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer, but I'm afraid $8000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm counteroffering at $12000. This is a fair price that I think we can both be happy with.

Hi Alice, thank you for the counteroffer! I understand that $12000 is a fair price for you, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $10500 is still a bit short of what I'm looking for. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get at least $13000 for the product. How about we meet at $12500?
Hi Alice, I understand that you're willing to compromise, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to go up to $11000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, but I really need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you at $12000, but I need to make a bit more. How about we meet at $12500 is too high, so I'll compromise at $12250?

Hi Alice, I understand that you're trying to get closer to your minimum price, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to go up to $11500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
